# MiniMax (China)

Use `minimax-cn/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "minimax-cn-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "minimax-cn/MiniMax-M2",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `MINIMAX_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/anthropic`

## Default base URL

`https://api.minimaxi.com/anthropic/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `MINIMAX_CN_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://platform.minimaxi.com/docs/guides/quickstart

<details>
  <summary>Show models (2)</summary>

- MiniMax-M2
- MiniMax-M2.1

</details>
